CustomProfile.Description: Arcana Heart 3: Love Max SixStarS!!!!!! is an updated version of Arcana Heart 3 that adds the hybrid valkyrie Minori Amanohara and her blood‑based Arcana Ichor. Additional Arcanas such as Parace L’Sia and Ichor expand the tactical options. Originally released in Japanese arcades in December 2014, this edition features Story, After‑Story, Survival Score Attack, Trial, Time Attack, Versus, Training and Replay Theatre modes. It builds on the all‑female cast with new moves, balance tweaks and network play for fans of anime‑style 2D fighting.
